review: Integrated apps and wifi for your HDMI TV. If you have online accounts (netflix, hulu, HBOgo....etc) this is the perfect product for you
author: John Chandler Calkins

review: Simple fast, would like the power supply come from the tv instead of a cord
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excelent way to enjoy my 65" TV. It compact, easy to manage and a lot of options. The remote control its to sensitive and look cheaper but it is funtional.
author: Gerardo Gonzalez

review: Horrible streaming quality. Highly compressed and lots of dropped frames. Disappointing. I activated my Prime account on my TiVo (which is also connected wireless) and the quality was very good. Not sure why, the the Fire TV Stick just looks awful. The interface is nice and easy to navigate. If the streaming quality were as good, I'd be able to recommend this. As it is, I would stay away.
author: Derek Ledbetter

review: I love the amazon fire stick,I just wish it was a little similar to add apps to the stick,the process is long and tedious.
author: oellis
